channel.title: 4DN News and Announcements

item.title: 4DN Phase II Kick-off Meeting!
item.description: The kick-off meeting for Phase II of 4D Nucleome will be held virtually on Zoom on December 2-4, 2020. Additional information and registration will come soon, stay tuned on the Web Portal!

item.title: PLAC-seq/HiChIP/in situ ChIA-PET protocols are available on the 4DN Portal Protocol Repository!
item.description: PLAC-seq/HiChIP/in situ ChIA-PET protocols to detect and quantify chromatin contacts anchored at genomic regions associated with specific DNA binding proteins or histone modifications are now approved by the Steering Committee.

item.title: iMARGI protocol is available on the 4DN Portal Protocol Repository!
item.description: in situ Mapping of RNA-chromatin interactions (iMARGI) protocol for mapping of chromatin-associated RNAs is now approved by the Steering Committee.

item.title: Check the new Nucleome Browser!
item.description: Nucleome Browser is a multimodal, interactive data visualization and exploration platform to integrate genomic, imaging, and 3D structure data.

item.title: 4DN Directory system launched!
item.description: 4DN OH has developed and deployed 4DN Directory, a centralized and integrated system for all 4DN personnel information where members can access the information of all 4DN members.
